plot: Barney is the black sheep of a rich family. He meets and falls in love Elanor at a family Christmas party. But, she falls for his brother instead, which leaves Barney and Elanor feuding. ...
title: La mujer de mi hermano
plot_es: Barney is the black sheep of a rich family. He meets and falls in love Elanor at a family Christmas party. But, she falls for his brother instead, which leaves Barney and Elanor feuding. ...
